CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Distemper_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Hepatitis_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Parainfluenza_Vaccine__c), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Parvovirus_Vaccine__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Physical_Exam__c ), TODAY() < (Most_Recent_Rabies_Vaccine__c ) ), "All Good", "Vacination(s) Expired")
CustomField.label: Health Care Records Status
